name: Squalane + Probiotic Balancing Gel Moisturizer
about: What it is: A lightweight gel moisturizer that rescues skin from redness, congestion, irritation, and sensitivity with live probiotic cultures that get your skinu2019s microbiome back in balance..Skin Type: Normal, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Redness, Acne and Blemishes..Formulation: Lightweight Gel..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Encapsulated Probiotics: Replenish and balance skinu2019s microbiome with healthy bacteria..- Sugarcane-Derived Squalane: Provides weightless hydration without clogging pores..- Bisabolol: Soothes irritation, reduces redness, and instantly relieves skin...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Rescue skin from redness, congestion, and inflammation with skinu2019s fire extinguisher: Probiotic Gel Moisturizer. Now with new encapsulated technology for the most potent active probiotics, this featherweight formula restores skinu2019s microbiome to keep skin calm, reduce excess oil, and visibly shrink pores. The relief is realu2014and so are the clinically backed results...Clinical Results:.After one day:.- 100% agree their skin looks calm and less irritated*.- 94% showed improvement in pore size**..After one week:.- 94% agree redness was visibly improved*..After four weeks:.- 97% agree their skin looks clearer*..*Based on a 4 week consumer study of 33 women, ages 18-50.**Based on a 4 week clinical study of 33 women, ages 18-50..Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: -Encapsulated Probiotics: Replenish and balance skinu2019s microbiome with healthy bacteria..-Sugarcane-Derived Squalane: Provides weightless hydration without clogging pores..-Bisabolol: Soothes irritation, reduces redness, and instantly relieves skin...Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Squalane, Lepidium Sativum Sprout Extract, Sodium Acrylates Copolymer, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Bisabolol, Phospholipids, Hansenula/Kloeckera/Lactobacillus/Lactococcus/Leuconostoc/Pediococcus/Saccharomyces/Fig/Lemon Ferment, Sodium Hyaluronate, Chondrus Crispus Extract, Allantoin, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Sterols, Linoleic Acid, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Diheptyl Succinate, Cellulose Gum, Lecithin, Sorbitan Oleate, Isoeicosane, Chitosan, Sodium Phytate, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Citric Acid......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to cleansed face and neck after eye products, serums, and treatments..-Use twice dailyu2014morning and night...Recycling Instructions:.-Remove and dispose of cap..-Empty and rinse remaining product from jar..-Place in curbside recycling..-The outer cartonu202fis made from sustainable FSC-certified sugarcaneu202fpaper andu202fcan be placed in curbside recycling.

When I ran out and saw the price for a replacement, I was shocked, but the visible results convinced me to buy it again. Iu2019m on my 4th jar now and still loving it. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So let me start off by saying I do quite enjoy this product. I LOVE the omega repair cream for my drier days, but most of the time it's too heavy and I was looking for something lighter. Imo the repair cream is worth the price tag, as it feels so rich and luxurious on the skin in a way that no other cream has felt before. This gel moisturizer...yes it feels nice, it doesn't pill with my other products, it hasn't broken me out, and I like that it has fermented ingredients (if it's good for you internally surely it's likely to have external benefits too right?). It's not too heavy, plays well under my makeup, and seems to keep my skin nicely hydrated....but is it so much better than my Paula's choice gel moisturizer that the hefty price tag is justified?? Idk...they feel pretty darn similar/the effect is basically the same.   If you're just looking for something that will work with this kind of texture, then there are other cheaper alternatives out there that you'll probably enjoy just as much. But, if you're looking to/don't mind splurging then it's definitely a good product and I'd give it a try.

My favorite ingredient in this are the active probiotics to help balance my skins microbiome. So it's really perfect for all skin types. Although this is a morning and night moisturizer I have really enjoyed using this in the AM. I highly recommend this for anyone with sensitive skin. reviews.review_text: Disclaimer( i am dark in complexion, hence i cant vouch whether this product was m effective in calming redness as marketed) Having concerns with my skin re. I would highly recommend this gel, my only tip is try to avoid if u live in hot areas where u tend to sweat a lot, because it might come off easily. reviews.review_text: I love a lot of biossance products so I was looking forward to trying this out from influenster in exchange for this review. I think this would be great for someone with Rosacea (both my mom and grandma have it and so I will have it one day) and I like the thought of my moisturizer assisting with redness. Itu2019s a gel cream hybrid that feels really light and moisturizing when applied. I like to apply this after toner to my face and neck. It absorbs very quickly which I liked especially in the morning during my routine. Iu2019ve also applied it to my hands and dry spots and my skin felt soft and moisturized. It wore well under my spf and under make up. Iu2019ve had no irritation nor any breakouts since using this on my sensitive acne prone skin. It has a bit of a silicone smell but otherwise fragrance free.  I love that their sugar cane derived squalane saves 2 million sharks annually?! Awesome. I did not have a chance to try the previous formula of this product, but this current formula is a dream. The only reason I gave it 4 out of 5 stars is because of the runny consistency. It makes it very messy in the jar you go to get a little and you end up getting a lot and it can drip everywhere. Otherwise formula wise itu2019s definitely a 5 star product Iu2019d recommend.

Although it didnu2019t decrease my redness: it didnu2019t cause me more irritation or inflammation, so Iu2019d say thatu2019s a great thing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

I do wish it had some SPF and it doesnu2019t really seem to reduce redness, but itu2019s a nice moisturizer and feels high quality. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A very light weight gel moisturizer, my oily skin loves light weight gel consistency. I donu2019t feel oily after using this. I wake up with redness around my nose and inflamed acne, after washing my face and putting this on, it calms my redness down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. This moisturizer feels very luxurious packaging wise, as it has some weight and is quite aesthetically pleasing. I really like the texture of this moisturizer as well, it is more of a thin consistency, which works well with my oily combination skin. There is a slight scent to this product, but it didnu2019t bother me too much. The main issue I had with this product is when I initially applied it, it left my skin feeling slightly uncomfortable. It wasnu2019t necessarily burning or irritating, but I could feel my face get a little warm when applied. The sensation went away after a few minutes, but it still was not the most pleasant feeling. I liked how my skin felt afterwards, as it felt very hydrated and soft. However, I noticed a few new breakouts on my skin while using this product. This happens to me with many new skincare products, so I wasnu2019t too surprised. If my skin reacted better though to this product, Iu2019m sure I would have used it often, but Iu2019m not sure if I want to continue use due to these issues.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great lightweight moisturizer, perfect for the summer or if you have oily skin. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to receive this as Iu2019ve heard great things about Biossance and finally got to try it but this didnu2019t hit for me. First off I hate the jar, especially since itu2019s suppose to have probiotics, the idea of having to expose the whole thing to air AND dip into it, even with a spatula, is so offputting. Second, I donu2019t understand who this is for. I have dry skin and it felt like it was suppose to be hydrating but thereu2019s some lingering stickiness that did not feel good. It is also a gel which isnu2019t ideal for dry skin but also contains squalene so itu2019s like, who is this really for, bc if I had oily skin itu2019d feel terrible too. Iu2019d go lower in stars but perhaps Im being harsh due to personal preferences, and it could be good for some people, just not me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin

Likes: - consistency - doesnu2019t feel like a regular gel moisturizer  - regulated some of the redness on my face - itu2019s absorbed quickly - great to use under makeup  Dislikes: - Didnu2019t notice any extraordinary effects  - not a great moisturizer in cold weather - definitely on the light side and you will still get dry skin - the scent is ok but could be better - it smells like drugstore lotion  ***only recommend for people with very oily skin who donu2019t want a heavy, really moisturizing product

I do not care for dipping my hands into the container or air getting into it daily. My last gripe is the lid. I appreciate the air tightness, but this lid is incredibly tough to take off. I enjoyed this product and for the price I would not repurchase this. Although itu2019s good, I donu2019t love it enough to replace the ones I already use and love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Not For My Extremely Sensitive Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so glad I tested the Biossance Squalane + Probiotic Balancing Gel Moisturizer on my arm before putting this on my face! Despite the claim that this is good for sensitive skin, even on my elbow, it started to burn almost immediately and ended up developing a mild rash the next day. This is a HARD pass from me. To be fair, my skin is so sensitive it develops a rash if I wear chemical sunscreen or brush my teeth with a fluoride toothpaste. If you have extremely sensitive skin like me, donu2019t leave your Vanicream or Cetaphil for it. But, if you have normal skin and are looking  for a clean product to try, you might have some luck with this.  Thank you Influenster and Biossance for sending me a complimentary product in exchange for an honest review!

Unfortunately, while itu2019s described as gel moisturizer, I personally think that it is more like a lotion and is too runny. I actually spilled this moisturizer twice because it is so runny. I have combination skin and it did absorb nicely but I feel that the title of the product is misleading. I am still very grateful to have received this product and plan to use it until it runs out but wanted to share my honest opinion. This is my opinion so you could still love it. I recommend reading other reviews before you decide.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this moisturizer! Iu2019ve tried the biossance omega cream which was rich but has a very intense earthy scent. This moisturizer has a lightweight gel texture and feels cool on the skin. I havenu2019t noticed any minimization of redness. I like that there isnu2019t a strong scent! I received this product from Influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this moisturizer! Itu2019s light weight and sinks in to the skin very quickly. Itu2019s not greasy or oily and goes very well under makeup. Could be more moisturizing but for a gel it does a good job!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Liking this so far. A little goes a long way and you donu2019t need a lot. Itu2019s not sticky and soaks into the skin perfectly. I can wear this before bed and under makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love having a moisturizer that not only doesnu2019t make my face oily but also helps with redness! I love using this at night so I donu2019t pack makeup onto it and just let the probiotics do their work

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it is really hydrating perfect I think for my oily skin it absorbs super well and doesnu2019t leave a greasy feeling it goes really nice and smooth under make up. A little goes a long way you do not need to apply a lot of it which is always nice..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive oily skin. My first impression when I opened this was the packaging isnu2019t the best. I feel this would be better in a pump than jar because of the consistency of the product. When I first applied it, I realized it would be a great moisturizer to use in the summer. It definitely wasnu2019t as moisturizing as I would like for the winter but it went on nicely and was moisturizing. I didnu2019t have any reaction to this and would patch test to be safe. I would recommend this for those who are looking for a light moisturizer in the summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this moisturizer, it's very light and refreshing. I added it to my morning routine since it's light enough to go under my sunscreen, yet it's very hydrating especially now that it's super cold outside. I feel it would be great to wear during warm months too. The formula is super gentle, my skin didn't have any reactions. My face looked dewy and healthy after a couple days using it. I would recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very nice gel moisturizer with virtually no scent. It absorbs into my skin within seconds and leaves me feeling so soft! I'll definitely enjoy using it up ud83dudc9a

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this moisturizer!! It makes my skin feel so soft! Itu2019s not irritating and it just feels amazing! I have very sensitive skin and I love this! Highly recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for a few weeks now. When I first started using it I found the moisturizer did a pretty good job controlling my oil/shine during the day - and I have oily skin so it was a nice change. However I still find myself reaching for my usual moisturizers in addition to this product.  Also, this moisturizer has no scent which I've heard is good for people with sensitive skin. But I like my products to have a scent so I didn't like that

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really love the moisturizer. Itu2019s very lightweight but provides awesome hydration.  I use it every day, keeps my skin from being overly oily and looks great under makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Good gel moisturizer. Leaves skin feeling hydrated and fresh. Comparable to Kielhs ultra facial moisturizing cream. Would recommend for all skin types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer! Itu2019s been great for the winter because itu2019s fast acting but not too heavy. The gel consistency is really nice and absorbs well. Good for day time and before bed. There is virtually no fragrance and the ingredients are so good for the skin. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product. I received this in exchange for me honest review and this product is insane for acne and blemish prone skin I wish I had used it before.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Biossance Squalane + Probiotic Balancing Gel Moisturizer is amazing. I have been using this for a while now and my skin has had no negative reactions. My face is sensitive and I was pleasantly surprised by the cool feeling when I first applied this moisturizer. It leaves my face hydrated and does not dry out my skin.  The consistency is a bit runny and I wish it had some sort of applicator but the product itself is great. I use it both day and night and definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Really soothing, light nice texture I love putting it on and actually look forward to it. I have pretty dry skin and this seems to work pretty well for me itu2019s also very lightweight overall great product

reviews.review_title: A lovely and calming lightweight moisturizer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As someone managing both oily skin and eczema, I find my skin needs frequently lightweight moisturizers and calming ingredients. Iu2019ve loved every Biossance product Iu2019ve tried and this one is no different! This product is lightweight so if your skin is dry it sinks right in, but is never heavy on your face. The calming probiotics and oat are great ingredients that help soothe sensitive skin. I recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve gotten so many compliments on my skin since I started using this moisturizer. My skin is usually pretty sensitive and prone to breakouts, but I havenu2019t had any problems.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this product, but it unfortunately came in a little lackluster for me. The packaging is beautiful and the weight of the container feels elegant and lovely. However, when you actually go to use the cream, it has an almost yogurt like consistency. Thin, runny yogurt. I wasn't the biggest fan of that. The cream itself was fine on my skin, but I didn't notice any real benefits. Stars for the packaging, ethical formula, and not breaking my skin out.

I really liked how this moisturizer smelled and felt very luxurious to put on. It didnu2019t quite settle into the skin the same way a creamy moisturizer does, but I applied it before bed and woke up to soft skin! However, there are some ingredients to make sure you can tolerate- I donu2019t think Iu2019d call it a gentle moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This formula was a little bit on the light/thin side for me but only because I have super dry skin. Itu2019s super nice for after working out and thatu2019s when I saw the best results. It helps with redness and evenness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is a little on the expensive side for me if Iu2019m honest. However if you enjoy this brand itu2019s a luxury moisturizer that wonu2019t break you out if you have oily issues! That being said, I think versed has some similar cheaper alternatives

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great for oily skin. So lightweight gives the hydration without the shine. I really liked it for me itu2019s hard to find a moisturizer that really works, the smell is a little off but fragrance is not the best for skin anyways.thank you influenster for this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great every day moisturizer. I have very dry skin that is also very sensitive, and I am able to use this moisturizer every day without feeling greasy, or without breaking out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I stopped using moisturizers a long time ago because no matter which ones Iu2019d try, theyu2019d always break me out or cause me to have little bumps on my face. (because I have very sensitive skin) I also felt like they were never actually moisturizing my face, my face would still feel dry afterwards. When I tell you I am sooo beyond impressed by this product, I truly am so blown away. I put this stuff ALL over my face and it does not break me out or give me any little bumps in the slightest. This product feels so good on the face and after applied my face stays glowy for a while. My face genuinely feels hydrated and healthy, I am SO happy to have found a moisturizer that is actually so amazing in every way. I HIGHLY HIGHLY recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very hydrating, and works well with sensitive skin bc no alcohol included

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer! It has worked well with my sensitive skin. I like that it doesnu2019t have a heavy scent and is a light weight gel moisturizer. Itu2019s great for the days when I donu2019t want to wear makeup. My other moisturizers that I wear as a base under my makeup are too heavy and oily . As a result, my hair will stick to my skin throughout the day and I look visibly oily by mid-day. However, with this moisturizer, my skin feels hydrated and Iu2019m not left with a tacky feeling nor oily look. It seeps well into my skin and settles nicely after just a few minutes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this moisturizer for a while and I have noticed it has helped tremendously with the redness on my face. I really like that itu2019s a gel consistency so it doesnu2019t feel heavy on my face itu2019s very moisturizing too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Ebony skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love everything about this gel moisturizer! It leaves my skin so moisturized and soft. I have really sensitive skin and my skin loves it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Since being pregnant, my skin was really bad. Lots of blemishes that were leaving red marks. I started to use this and itu2019s really cleared things up and is super refreshing when I put it on. Iu2019m very pleased with this product.

reviews.review_title: Clear skin and hydration?! A must have!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this product for 2 weeks now and itu2019s a game changer! My skin is known to get overly dry in the winter and this has helped with hydration immensely. Iu2019ve also noticed my skin is much clearer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted from Influenster in exchange of my review. This moisturizer is very lightweight and gets absolutely easily by my skin. It has reduced the redness on my skin. My skin feels more hydrated, softer and smoother. I recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really want to love this moisturizer. I generally love a gel moisturizer because my skin is quite dehydrated, but this one seems to make my skin feel textured and break me out. Maybe the squalane does not agree with my skin, but unfortunately this one wasn't a hit for me. It is quite nice to apply and feels refreshing in the immediate. I received this item for free in exchange for my review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So far I like it. I think I need to use it longer to see if it helps my skin but no skin issues and Iu2019m not sensitive to it so thatu2019s good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this moisturizer! It has been a game-changer for my skin. The texture is so lightweight and hydrating, leaving my skin feeling plump and refreshed in the morning. Great for mature skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely one of my favorite gel moisturizers. I received this one for free in exchange for my honest review however, previously I have purchased this moisturizer with my own money and have not been disappointed. It is very creamy and I have not experienced any pilling. It feels luxurious!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this is a plastic free moisturizer. Iu2019ve been trying to cut down on my exposure to microplastics and it seems like all skincare products are still in plastic packaging that can leach into the product. Itu2019s a thick cream that has to be massaged in. The finish is a bit sticky to the touch which makes it a nice daytime moisturizer to go under makeup. Itu2019s not a heavy duty moisturizer IMO, but Iu2019m pretty pleased with it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this moisturizer. The gel texture was light which was great for my oily skin and it did not break out my acne prone skin. Felt hydrating

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this moisturizer- I mostly use it at night, itu2019s lightweight and moisturizing while still being nonsticky, and Iu2019ve used it under makeup and it works well.  *Received from Influenster as part of a VoxBox campaign in exchange for my honest review*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Biossance products! Theyu2019re a brand I trust in when it comes to clean skincare. I was really interested in getting to try this reformulated moisturizer, and I was not disappointed. It left my skin feeling smooth and really hydrated. Itu2019s my go to especially in the colder months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this product. Overall kept my face hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this as a free sample and I really liked this lotion overall. It was great for my sensitive and acne prone skin and I definitely noticed improvement with breakouts since using it. Iu2019m not sure how much it helped with redness since I donu2019t really have irritated skin.  It could be a little more moisturizing but I would definitely purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is a great makeup base, it has such a soothing feel and it goes on so smoothly. It hydrates my skin nicely and i like the ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Influenster and Biossance for testing purposes and my honest review. Overall, this product is a good lightweight moisturizer that is good for everyday and still provides enough moisture to the skin to feel nourished. I like that itu2019s fragrance free and absorbs fairly quickly into the skin without leaving a sort of film. I have normal to combo skin and I still will get oily throughout the day but I just fix that with some powder to touch-up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did receive this product for free to try. I like this but l'm not in love with it. It does help your face feel hydrated and it helps your face feel plump. However, you do have to use certain things with it or it'll cause it to peel and shed off your face. I haven't tried it under makeup because I am scared that it's just going to cause the peeling and shedding. It does feel nice on the skin just something that's not for everyone. I have heard people say it's causing to breakout and have an allergic reaction so I admit I put this over my acne moisturizer and blend them together. I like it but again not amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is perfect for wintertime. Iu2019ve been using it for two weeks to test the results and the packaging doesnu2019t lie. The redness on my face is nearly non-existent and my skin has very little acne. 10/10 recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influencer and BIOSSANCE in exchange for my honest review. (Incentive). Upon opening it I didn't notice a strong smell to it, the scent was very settle and had no strong perfume smell to it. The moisturizer was very smooth to apply and wasn't sticky. I did notice my skin felt very smooth and moist after a few uses. I normally have oily skin and this moisturizer didn't leave me feeling more oily or dry. My foundation applied smoothly after apply it. I didn't notice any breakout after a few uses. I would recommend this product and will continue to use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this product is vegan and fragrance free! Also it doesnu2019t irritate my extremely sensitive skin. Itu2019s really hard to find suitable skincare products but I think I  finally found the right brand for me :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this product to try and I absolutely LOVE it! I have very sensitive, acne prone skin and since I began using this product consistently I have noticed a night and day difference. My skin feels a lot more hydrated and looks a lot clearer/even textured. I would definitely recommend and will be purchasing again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product works well! Itu2019s very hydrating while still being light weight. It feels nice on the skin and it doesnu2019t have much of a smell. My skin stayed hydrated for longer than expected when using it. I recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! Honestly I thought this moisturizer would be like any other gel moisturizer on the market but it is so much better! It is extremely soothing and makes my redness and inflammation look less noticeable. It is also just the right amount of moisture for my normal to oily skin. Will probably repurchase when I finish the tub!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m not going to lie to you and say I use this everyday because I definitely forgot to a few days a week but I have noticed a difference in my skin the days that I do use this. Itu2019s currently winter and most days are below 40F outside. Normally over the winter my skin will be so dry and Iu2019ll have dry patches on my face, but this winter I havenu2019t had that issue and this is the only new product Iu2019ve been using so I highly recommend it! I need to get better on using it everyday and will more than likely be repurchasing it when I finish it and trying other products from the brand!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has such a nice light texture that is slightly watery. I find this moisturizer to be what it is. Very lightweight and calms redness on my skin  It doesnu2019t appear to have any scent and dries down nicely on my skinu2014 leaving it with a nice glossy finish.   True to what they say it is good for oily, combo skin. I cant see this to be moisturizing enough for dry skin.

reviews.review_title: A new go-to for my PM routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this product by Influenster for my honest review. Really impressed with this moisturizer. I was surprised by how u201cliquidyu201d/thin it was, but it felt so nice and refreshing once on. I have oily-combination skin, and found this to be very balancing and not too heavy (although Iu2019d only use it in my PM skincare routine since it is heavier than my typical Tatcha water cream for daytime use). It worked well with my other PM products (Innisfree Green Tea Toner, Sunday Rileyu2019s Good Genes, Kiehlu2019s eye cream), and did not cause any breakouts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this moisturizer a month ago, and been using it constantly. I definitely like its lightweight texture since I can layer this with my other skincare products, and doesnu2019t make my face feel greasy. Itu2019s doing its excellent job as keeping my skin moisturized. This product did reduce my redness after a few days. How do I use it?: after cleansing, toner, essences and a bunch of serums, this moisturizer will be my last step before a sunscreen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly love Biossance as a brand. Squalene works so much better on my skin than HA. I do wish that they had sent this over during the summertime. My skin is very dry, which meant I had to layer this product for it to work. This is better for normal to oily skin (which is what my skin is during the summer). There's no weird scent to it or fragrance. It's a clean product, great for sensitive skin. I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a pretty good moisturizer. I found it to have a really nice creamy and luxurious consistency to it without being too heavy. I personally need a moisturizer that will really lock in the moisture and help reduce redness on my face. I found that this definitely moisturized my face but did not help with redness, and even kind of irritated the skin which is kind of disappointing because I was hoping to love this product. If you donu2019t need that redness reducing aspect in a moisturizer then you will probably like this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I use this moisturizing as part of my day time routine. It is very light weight and airy. Thats something I prefer. I use a heavy product for night time. It does the job and keeps your face feeling glowy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Soaks right into the skin. Feels great on the skin. Absorbs quickly and packaging is great. Helped the hydration and overall complexion of my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this cream for 15 days daily and noticed that it calmed down redness/irritation on my face. It was also pretty lightweight and got absorbed pretty quickly. So, all in all, I would recommend/ repurchase this product. The only downside is that it smells a little weird. As a side note: I am a 26F with dry and sensitive skin.

reviews.review_title: Decent cream but smells a little weird
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is relatively lightweight and gets absorbed into the skin pretty quickly. I would repurchase/ recommend this product as it has helped reduce redness and irritation from my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product to review. Such a wonderful, lightweight moisturizer will definitely be using more in the upcoming summer months. I enjoy the gel texture of this product and recommend as a good summer moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Biossance Squalene + Probiotic Gel is refreshingly light. I have been using it for over 2 weeks now. My skin just drinks it up. It definitely calmed my skin during a week I had a lot of hormonal acne. Itu2019s a gel, so keep in mind that it has a liquidy consistency. Not scented. I have dry skin, so I would usually apply a thicker moisturizer on top. If you have oily/combo skin. This moisturizer is for you!! If you have dry skin, Iu2019d recommend finding something else thatu2019s thicker and creamier. I absolutely love the packaging, and you can definitely tell the quality of the product is there.  I received this product for free from Influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.  I have combination skin that can get very oily around the T zone but also dry everywhere else.  Before receiving this product I was following a skincare routine that includes tretinoin twice a week. The vitamin A was irritating my skin and causing some peeling with breakouts. Since this product is supposed to help with all that, I decided to try that combination. This moisturizer is very rich but not super thick. My face definitely feels very hydrated afterwards but it didnu2019t help with redness or breakouts. If you are looking to add a very hydrating moisturizer to your skin care routine, I definitely recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was surprised to receive a gel moisturizer I. The winter and expected it to be too light for my skin which tends to dry out over the winter. However, this moisturizer has the perfect balance between a cream and a gel. I wear it during the day and my face stays hydrated without feeling tight or greasy. I love the sustainable ingredients and high quality glass packaging too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the texture but I feel like this would be a good moisturizer for the summer when itu2019s already humid out because it didnu2019t feel enough for the drier winter months especially for my combination skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gel moisturizer lives up to its claims for the most part, but it did take time for me to notice a difference of clearer skin with less redness, about 1-2 weeks. It absorbs into the skin quickly and doesnu2019t leave any sticky residue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product for free to give my honest review so here it goes Super fresh and moisturizing without feeling too heavy on the skin or closing my pores hydrating all day and a nice smell that doesnu2019t irritate my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is not for me. I got rashes in different areas of my face. It took some time for it to clear up and it was hard not to irritate it more. The product was light weight and a small amount goes a long way. I wanted to give it to my sister but her skin is just as sensitive and I donu2019t want her to break out

reviews.review_title: Really nice, didn't break me out.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the lightweight texture of the moisturizer. I have sensitive skin and I had no problem with this breaking me out. I would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This brand has such good reviews, I think I was hoping for more or better.  This moisturizer goes on so smooth but it just feels like a film on my face. It's winter so I want a more heavy duty moisturizer. Maybe in the warmer months this would feel better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A light and airy moisturizer that boosts moisture and face plumpness without adding a greasy sheen. Perfect for daytime or to slather on at night!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I found this to be moisturizing and helped with some of the redness in my skin but definitely helped calm my skin down during the stressful holidays. So far no complaints besides the fact it did not come with a spatula or scoop. Will consider purchasing in the future, but it's a bit expensive. [I received this for free to try]

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is overall pretty good, Iu2019m happy with it! I have very sensitive skin and use tretinoin which often leaves my skin irritated and my skin barrier damaged. I will say if your skin barrier is damaged, wait until you have that under control and skip this product because it will burn a little. Otherwise I have been using this product morning and night for almost a month with no complaints!   Pros: Lightweight  No scent Semi gentle on skin  Can wear under makeup without it causing the foundation to separate  Leaves skin instantly hydrated  Cons: Packaging is my main complaint, itu2019s heavy and not easy to travel with. The product is so thin itu2019s almost a milky texture so if you travel with this product it gets very messy, stuck in the lid and is very runny so it can be messy to use. I think a pump bottle of some sort would be great for this product. My face looked so balanced and bright after application and the effect lasts throughout the day. I felt like this moisturizer was healing to my skin barrier honestly. My usual irritation around my breakouts and all signs of redness were nowhere to be found. While I wouldnu2019t have described my face as inflamed prior to this experience, I think the visible difference proves how much I needed this. I am very pleased at how this product lived up to its claims and I respect the brand even more for not overselling what this moisturizer can do. I used to consider myself quite loyal to my daily moisturizer, but I will definitely be buying another jar of this soothing Biossance miracle!

reviews.review_title: Great Day and Night Time Moisturizer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: To start with, I have oily and acne prone skin. I can't use thick/ heavy moisturizers as they clog my pores and is too much for my skin. With that being said, the Squalane + Probiotic Balancing Gel Moisturizer by Biossance is a great option for those with skin types similar to mine. The moisturizer is water gel-based', not thick and absorbs well into the skin. The application is easy as it glides smoothly across the skin. There's no heavy fragrance that may cause irritations and a little product goes a long way. It's a great moisturizer for any time of the day because it doesn't leave any residue on the skin. During the day, it doesn't cause my skin to become oily and at night it's light enough where I don't have to worry about product going everywhere on my pillow. My face definitely feels dewy and refreshed throughout the day and night. My only criticism is that for the price, I do not feel like it's exceedingly better than other water-based moisturizers I've used. Although, I enjoyed using this product, knowing that there's similar moisturizers for almost half the price does deter me from wanting to purchase this in the future. However I still encourage others to give it a try to see for themselves.

reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for a review. I have used gel moisturizers before in the summertime. I had received this moisturizer right in the beginning of the winter time when it was just getting colder. I decided to give it a try to see how it would hold up. Typically gel moisturizers are better for summer for me since they absorb easier but the squalene in the product gave me hope it would moisturize even in the colder times. Impressively enough it did hold out during the wind and cold. Mind you I prefer a THICKK moisturizer in winter since my skin gets a little peely. I peeled just a little around my eye area but for a gel moisturizer it did an impressive job. I did notice I was less oily but it was winter and I'm not as oily. In terms of redness I didn't notice too much of a difference (not as red during winter) but around summer I would probably pull it out again and see the difference in seasons. I also like how there isn't a heavy fragrance. The reason I took off a star was because even though this is an incentivized post i believe price point is important. It is a bit expensive but it is pretty on par with its other products so I can't complain too much. However there mission, product aesthetic, and packaging makes up the difference for me. If you need a summertime moisturizer, I would keep this in your back pocket. For winter if you peel like me maybe opt for something thicker but it still did the trick!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Yes, I received this product for testing, and I have been testing it for a week now, I take reviewing products seriously whether I got it for free or I paid for it.  Here is my experience:  I have a highly sensitive skin that can easily react to any product, causing breakouts, irritation, redness, clogged pores, dry patches, and more. Due to this, I am very particular about what I put on my face.  I have been using this product day and night for about a week and have noticed that it does not cause any issues to my skin, which is a big plus. It also helps to calm down any redness I may have in the morning. Additionally, it applies smoothly on my skin.  Will I continue using this product? Perhaps. While I do have my own daily moisturizer that I use, this product could be a great option for those days when my skin is inflamed and red.

reviews.review_text: I got this to try from Influenster program. I like this moisturizer. It feels very lightweight and didnu2019t cause any breakouts on me on my acne prone skin. It feels moisturizing. Also it does not have any weird scent which can happen to a lot of face product. I would recommend.

I love how itu2019s a gel but yet itu2019s the perfect consistency not too thick & not too thin. Itu2019s very hydrating and I love that it doesnu2019t have a scent. It just gives that clean beauty feeling

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was provided this as a sample to try. The only other Biossance product Iu2019ve tried is their Omega Repair Cream which I really loved but I have combo skin. My first impression was this is a very thin formula, and I wish it had come in a pump bottle instead of a jar. I replaced my usual nighttime gel moisturizer with this for two weeks. The product absorbs quickly and didnu2019t leave any stickiness or greasiness. As far as moisturizing, my skin always felt soft and hydrated the next day (even with me using retinol). I donu2019t usually suffer from redness so canu2019t speak to how much it helps for that. I didnu2019t notice any new breakouts from it though. Overall if you donu2019t mind a thin consistency I would recommend this product. For me, they would either need to repackage or thicken the formula for me to re-buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Biossance Squalane + Probiotic Gel Moisturizer for free in exchange of my review.  Ive used it for several weeks, and the results are impressive. After just one week, redness was visibly reduced, and my skin looks clearer and more balanced.  The clinical results align with my experience, as my skin appears calmer and less irritated. The 100% agreement in the consumer study reflects the product's effectiveness in providing instant relief. I especially like the versatility of this moisturizer u2013 it works well for both morning and night use.  Overall, Biossance Squalane + Probiotic Gel Moisturizer deliverer on its promises and left my skin visibly improved.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have not used the old formula of this exact Biossance Moisturizer, but have read reviews on Biossance, Sephora and makeup/skincare forums that all say it is not even half as strong as the old formula- which is why I am giving it 3 stars.  For $56/ 1.69 fl oz, it is still a good price (Cliniqueu2019s Moisturize Surge Line 72hr and 100hr run around this price point). It has beautiful packaging, and is well made so Iu2019m not afraid of dropping it or traveling with it (did just fine for the holidays). I waited to review this product for about a month, assuming it would be a stronger formulation. I have a 4fl oz sample of the Squalane + Copper Peptide Serum which I rotate in my skincare routine twice a week due to the strength of the ingredients; acids, proteins, vitamins etc. The Biossance Squalane and Probiotic Gel Moisturizer is more gentle- I can use it daily or twice daily without any reaction from my skin, but did use it every other night for the first week. It is soothing, does seem to reduce oil (very oily with dry spots) and looks like a thick cream but is a gel solution that needs to sit and sink into the skin a bit longer than a basic moisturizer. Since using it, my foundation has gone on much more smoothly, and the texture has decreased in problem areas, so while I donu2019t believe anything u201cshrinks poresu201d I do believe it is helping the skin barrier stay stronger. I am happy with the price point for the product for what it does, and am likely to purchase from Biossance again in the future. I expect it will last a good 3 months as very little is required (quarter sized dollop). *Received free from Influenster in exchange for my honest opinion and review*.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest review.   That being said, I did not expect much. I have extremely sensitive, dry, problematic skin. Most moisturizers leave a greasy film on my skin, and don't actually help with the dryness. So, I really thought this product wouldn't be any different.   Honestly? I was wrong.   Upon opening the package, I was met with a very high-end container, which does that additional little click thing as you tighten it to keep your product from drying out. I believe the container may be made of glass, which is rather impressive at this price point.   The product itself is smooth and of a thinner consistency. This means I am able to apply lesser amounts of product and cover more ground with it, using less product overall.   There is no smell, thank God. Any sense or fragrances may irritate my skin, causing redness and irritation (I tend to struggle with that).   After trying this product for 2 weeks, I am absolutely blown away. No longer do I have a greasy residue all over my skin, and no longer do I have horrifically dry, irritated red skin.   The price point for this is rather decent as well.   10/10. I will purchase another once this one runs out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Biossance Squalane Probiotic Moisturizer has become a must-have in my skincare routine, especially during the scorching summer months. This little gem comes in a luxe glass packaging that adds a touch of elegance to my vanity, making me feel pampered every time I use it, and I appreciate the commitment to sustainability.  One of the standout features of this product is its jelly-like consistency, which feels incredibly lightweight on the skin. Even in the sweltering heat, it is easily absorbed, leaving my face feeling refreshed and hydrated without any greasy or heavy residue. I also love how it plays well under makeup, acting as a smooth canvas for easy application.  Having sensitive combination skin, I am always cautious about trying new products. However, the Biossance Squalane Probiotic Moisturizer worked wonders for me - it didn't cause any breakouts or irritation, nor did it make my t-zone oily. Instead, it left my skin feeling plump and nourished throughout the day, while allowing my skin to breathe.  In conclusion, the Biossance Squalane Probiotic Moisturizer is a game-changer for anyone seeking a lightweight, non-greasy, and hydrating formula for even the hottest of days. Its luxurious packaging, jelly consistency, and skin-friendly properties make it an absolute winner in my books. I highly recommend it to anyone in need of a reliable, nourishing moisturizer that won't disappoint!

This runny consistency with its watery gel like texture is actually kind of perfect for my skin because a little goes a long way and itu2019s not thick and greasy itu2019s really light and feels like it really sinks in. I would say this moisturizer is good for all those with tough combination skin that get dry but also struggle with products that make them look too oily. This moisturizer leaves my skin looking healthy and plump. Like I drink a ton of water and just have good healthy skin. Itu2019s like a drink of water loaded with nourishing ingredients. I have yet to be disappointed by a product from Biossance. Iu2019ve used this for a couple weeks now and you canu2019t even tell Iu2019ve used it daily. Thatu2019s how well this one will last you really donu2019t need to overdo it. Itu2019s amazing.

reviews.review_title: Reformulated into a less effective product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: They reformulated this product and took out all the silicone. The problem with that is that silicone is an occlusive ingredient that prevents water loss from the skin. Without it, this moisturizer is hydrating but you would need something thicker on top to really keep the moisture in your skin. This would really only work for the daytime when you donu2019t need something as occlusive. Also, I never had any issues with the old formulation, but this new version feels almost minty on the skin and I wake up with my skin feeling tight and almost stinging. I feel like they were giving in to all of the clean beauty fear mongering nonsense thatu2019s out there.

It has become a staple in my skincare routine. It effectively addressed my dryness concerns, reducing the tightness around my nose area, while simultaneously calming and nourishing my skin. reviews.review_text: Had the chance to try this product as part of the Biossance testing community and have to say, I am a convert. I was a swimmer my whole life and always used CeraVe to help moisturize my skin from the chlorine. After using this, I will never go back. It is super lightweight and leaves my skin so hydrated.

Since the first day, I liked the non-greasy, fluid, non-thick, non-scented texture. It applies very well, penetrates quite quickly. I noticed that it refreshed me a lot. By applying it in the morning and in the evening, in my routine care, day by day my face seemed more lustrous, my freckles seemed less apparent. I had small redness and it completely disappeared. On the forehead, it seems to me that my already established wrinkles seem less pronounced. I love this exceptional cream.The end result is firmer skin, less visible pores, more even and lustrous complexion.

For me it's just been the perfect amount of everything. This has not once gave me any oily or greasy feel or appearance to my skin. Having combo, aging and acne tendencies I am over the top happy that this has went to my #1 spot as moisturizer for me!! I will add that this has not irritated my skin or acne in any way. My opinions here have not been influenced by anything nor anyone except for my truthful experience and opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster for free in exchange for my honest review.   To start, I have something known as mass cells. My skin reacts to even a small poke, punch, etc. Especially when I sue a pimple popper my skin will welp up for a few hours after. I usually use a green tea mask that dries out the pours and calms my skin however this moisturizer has a lot of key ingredients that are key for what Iu2019m looking for. I have dry- barely oily, but always red and irritated skin. Iu2019m not sure if itu2019s my diet or just my natural complexion. It cracks, it swells, and it is always red in my T-zone.  To start, I appreciate the squalane is plant based- it works to help moisturize my skin and helps with anti-inflammatory issues, while not using squalane harvested from shark organs. Red seaweed and ginger extract is a huge win for my skin, it helps in this and other products I have to de-stress the appearance of my skin.  Prior to putting this on, I did my usual routine. I popped a few pimples, but decided to skip the green tea drying mask. I wanted to try this moisturizer because it claims to be u201cfast actingu201d, so I applied it in the u201cif case scenariou201d of me being in a rush to get out the door. Within the initial application my face felt cooled, and heavily hydrated. Though it took about 5-10 minutes before I noticed the pimples I had just popped actually seemed less red. It did not agitate them more as open pours and rather did calm them down. I work the moisturizer for the next 8 hours, and in the end went to sleep and woke up with my skin happy with me.   Overall extremely satisfied with my product, very happy with its performance, and would recommend to others. I personally will be buying it again, because despite the $54 price point, it has the key ingredients to help my personal red/agitated skin combination.
